statements: SELECT investor_id, social_media_handle, sentiment_score, sentiment_date FROM investor_sentiment;
SELECT sentiment_date, social_media_handle, investor_id, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment;
SELECT social_media_handle, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 3.5;
SELECT investor_id, social_media_handle FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT social_media_handle, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 3.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, sentiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment WHERE social_media_handle LIKE '%john%' AND sentiment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT investor_id, sentiment_date, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_date > '2022-04-15' ORDER BY sentiment_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT social_media_handle FROM investor_sentiment WHERE social_media_handle IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM investor_sentiment;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment;
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE investor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT investor_name, post_text, post_likes FROM investor_sentiment JOIN social_media_posts ON investor_sentiment.id = social_media_posts.investor_id;
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 50 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT investor_name, social_media_platform, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE social_media_platform IN ('Twitter', 'Facebook') AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT investor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM investor_sentiment JOIN social_media_posts ON investor_sentiment.id = social_media_posts.investor_id GROUP BY investor_name HAVING total_posts > 10 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_likes > 1000 AND post_comments > 500 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT investor_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM investor_sentiment GROUP BY investor_name HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) < 50 ORDER BY avg_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment ORDER BY investor_name DESC;
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT investor_name, social_media_handle, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment WHERE social_media_handle IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT social_media_handle, post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM social_media_posts WHERE investor_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY investor_name ASC, id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT investor_name, social_media_handle, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM investor_sentiment GROUP BY investor_name, social_media_handle HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.3
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment JOIN social_media_posts ON investor_sentiment.id = social_media_posts.investor_id WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC

SELECT investor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM investor_sentiment JOIN social_media_posts ON investor_sentiment.id = social_media_posts.investor_id GROUP BY investor_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT sh.analysis_date, sp.post_content FROM sentiment_history sh JOIN social_media_posts sp ON sh.post_id = sp.post_id WHERE sh.sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sh.analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment_data;
SELECT id, social_media_platform, date_posted FROM investor_sentiment_data ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM investor_sentiment_data ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT social_media_platform, COUNT(*) FROM investor_sentiment_data GROUP BY social_media_platform ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count, join_date FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM investor_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT i.post_text, s.category_name FROM investor_sentiment_data i JOIN sentiment_mapping m ON i.id = m.post_id JOIN sentiment_categories s ON m.category_id = s.category_id;
SELECT * FROM InvestorsSentiment;
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM InvestorsSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM InvestorsPosts WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT hashtag_name AS hashtag, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM Hashtags JOIN PostHashtags ON Hashtags.hashtag_id = PostHashtags.hashtag_id GROUP BY hashtag_name;
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM InvestorsPosts JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON InvestorsPosts.post_id = SentimentAnalysis.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM InvestorsSentiment ORDER BY investor_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT investor_name, sentiment_score FROM InvestorsSentiment WHERE investor_name LIKE 'A%' OR investor_name LIKE '%s';
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM InvestorsPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT investor_name, post_text, hashtag_name FROM InvestorsSentiment JOIN InvestorsPosts ON InvestorsSentiment.id = InvestorsPosts.investor_id JOIN PostHashtags ON InvestorsPosts.post_id = PostHashtags.post_id JOIN Hashtags ON PostHashtags.hashtag_id = Hashtags.hashtag_id WHERE investor_name = 'Alice' AND hashtag_name = 'crypto';
SELECT post_text, sentiment_score FROM InvestorsPosts JOIN SentimentAnalysis ON InvestorsPosts.post_id = SentimentAnalysis.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
